CMap Career Mobility Data

Source: R/model_data.R
model_data.Rd

A processed tibble containing job transition and specialization features from the CMap dataset, as described in Subhani et al. (2025): https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-025-05526-3

Usage

model_data

Format

A tibble with N rows and M columns. The main columns include:

job_title_from

Source job title for the transition (character).

job_title_to

Destination job title for the transition (character).

transition_count

Number of times this job-to-job transition occurs in the raw promotion data (numeric).

job_count_in_sector

Number of times the job appears in the specialization index (sector-specific count, numeric).

transition_weighted_count

Weighted or normalized count of transitions from the promotions data (numeric).

job_weighted_count_in_sector

Weighted or normalized count of job title occurrences in the specialization index (numeric).

promotion_probability

Estimated probability of promotion for this job-to-job transition (numeric between 0 and 1).

region

Region where the transition occurred (factor/character).

sector

Sector code or name for the job (factor/character).

validated

Indicator for whether the transition was validated (logical/factor).

si_from

Specialization Index for the source job (numeric).

se_from

Sector Exclusivity for the source job (numeric).

sd_from

Sector Dominance for the source job (numeric).

weighted_freq_from

Weighted frequency for the source job (numeric).

si_to

Specialization Index for the destination job (numeric).

se_to

Sector Exclusivity for the destination job (numeric).

sd_to

Sector Dominance for the destination job (numeric).

weighted_freq_to

Weighted frequency for the destination job (numeric).

si_difference

Difference in specialization index (destination - source).

sd_difference

Difference in sector dominance (destination - source).

popularity_difference

Difference in weighted frequency (destination - source).

education_progression_score

Data-derived score for educational progression (numeric).

job_start_score

Data-derived score for starting a new job (numeric).

upward_mobility

Indicator if the promotion probability is high (binary/int).

career_stagnation

Indicator if the promotion probability is low (binary/int).

job_hopping_potential

Indicator if the transition suggests high job hopping (binary/int).

source_file

File path of the source data (character).

Source

https://zenodo.org/records/15260189
